title: .19 Why The Bronx Burned
description: In 1970's NYC, huge swaths of the city were engulfed in flames. Bad stats may have been to blame. Joe Flood, author of "The Fires," tells the story.
itunes:title: .19 Why The Bronx Burned
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
itunes:subtitle: In 1970's NYC, huge swaths of the city were engulfed in flames. Bad stats may have been to blame. Joe Flood, author of "The Fires," tells the story.
